Mildred Hall

  1. Foster Name: Mildred
  2. Foster Family: Charles and Isabelle Kunz
  3. Foster Family Alt: Koontz
  4. Location of Family: Wood River, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Aurora, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 7
  8. Date of Birth: 1908-08-21, DeKalb, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1986-11-23
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Mildred Gloe; Stahlnecker
  12. Spouse Name: Rudolph Gloe; John Stahlnecker
  13. Source: OTR, 305; Hamilton County Register, 22 June 1917; Wood River Sunbeam, 27 November 1986; Interview of Mildred Gloe; 1910 United States Federal Census; 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; 1940 United States Federal Census; Gravestone, Wood River Cemetery, Wood River, NE.
